name: HopperScripts
tagline: Python Scripts for use with Hopper Disassembler
body:
The script stash for [Hopper Disassembler](http://hopperapp.com) by [Cryptic Apps](http://www.cryptic-apps.com).  [Contribute a script](https://github.com/phracker/HopperScripts/compare/) today!

### To Install:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/phracker/HopperScripts ~/Library/Application\ Support/Hopper/Scripts/HopperScripts
```

### Reference Material

Check out the [Hopper Scripting Reference](https://github.com/phracker/HopperScripts/wiki/Hopper-Script-Reference) if you're new to scripting for Hopper.

### Credits:

Check our [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/phracker/HopperScripts) for the latest credits.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
